entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as happily plumping up Bill's pillows and expressing her opinion on British cooking habits.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as the person Fleur is marrying.

entities.name: ginnny
entities.description: Ginny is described as sighing and looking out over the twilit grounds with Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sitting beside Ginny in the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as asking Hermione about anyone else they know who died.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as perusing the Evening Prophet and winces at Ron's forced toughness in his voice.

entities.name: evening prophet
entities.description: The Evening Prophet is described as a newspaper that Hermione is perusing.

relationships.description: Fleur and Bill are mentioned as getting married.
Ron is concerned about Hermione's reaction to the news of someone dying.
Harry and Ginny are sitting together in the Gryffindor common room, indicating a close friendship.
Ron is concerned about Hermione's reaction to the news of someone dying.
